thoughts.text: I think I will start by exploring the Brno Reservoir trail that was mentioned. It seems like a great place to start my adventure and I am excited to see what it has to offer. I should also keep in mind that I want to pursue simple strategies with no legal complications, so I will need to be mindful of any rules or regulations in the area. I should also make sure to review and analyze my actions to ensure I am performing to the best of my abilities.
